(€3) and some limited direct services to other points nearby.  The bus station is very centrally located at the edge of the old town, and there's a map to orient yourself as you exit.  On weekdays, buses leave every 15-30 minutes from 5 AM until 11 PM and take just under an hour.  On weekends, services are reduced to once per hour.
Škofja Loka is easily covered on foot.
